casebody.data:
No. 09-1461. Association of Christian Schools International, et al., Petitioners v. Roman Stearns, et al. 562 U.S. 975, 131 S. Ct. 456,

178 L. Ed. 2d 314,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7862. October 12, 2010.

Motion of Catholic League, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 362 Fed. Appx. 640.
